messages.title: Who will really deliver for Portsmouth?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems will bring back full border checks that were phased out by successive Conservative and Governments.
The Lib Dems have committed to invest £8bn a year more into the NHS to ensure that it remains a world class service we can all be proud of.
The Lib Dems have worked to halve the deficit left behind by Labour. They'll continue to do so by investing in jobs and apprenticeship places.

issues.economy: investing in jobs and apprenticeship places.
issues.health: invest £8bn a year more into the NHS

politicalExperience.achievements: Invested £5 million to create 1,000 more classroom spaces in the city and positioned the government to keep the Royal Navy in Portsmouth, saving 10,000 jobs in the Dockyard.

images.caption: Gerald Vernon-Jackson and Jason Fazackarley are the team to deliver for our area.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Jason Fazackarley has the passion and commitment to deliver for our area. As a councillor and cabinet member for Traffic and Transportation, Jason knocked on hundreds of doors to discuss issues directly with residents. Focused on anti-social behaviour issues, organizing speed-watch sessions.
